collegues.name: reviewer
collegues.task: ユーザーから申請された書類画像を参照し、訂正・受理を行う。書類画像が必須である。

collegues.name: broker
collegues.task: ユーザーの要望と一致する、訂正・受理できる書類の詳細を提示する。

indicators.name: counter_performance
indicators.definition: A rating from 1 to 4 (low, medium, high, very high)

indicators.name: broker_performance
indicators.definition: A rating from 1 to 4 (low, medium, high, very high)

indicators.name: reviewer_performance
indicators.definition: A rating from 1 to 4 (low, medium, high, very high)

indicators.name: observer_performance
indicators.definition: A rating from 1 to 4 (low, medium, high, very high)

indicators.name: overall_performance
indicators.definition: A rating from 1 to 4 (low, medium, high, very high)
